# Weighted LDA
```{r,  warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.align='center'}
library(keyATM)
data(keyATM_data_bills)
bills_dfm <- keyATM_data_bills$doc_dfm  # quanteda object
keyATM_docs <- keyATM_read(bills_dfm)
```

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.align='center'}
out <- keyATM(keyATM_docs = keyATM_docs,  # text input
              regular_k   = 7,            # number of regular topics
              model       = "lda",        # select the model
              options     = list(seed = 100))
top_words(out)
```



# Weighted LDA HMM
```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.align='center'}
library(keyATM)
data(keyATM_data_bills)
bills_dfm <- keyATM_data_bills$doc_dfm  # quanteda object
bills_time_index <- keyATM_data_bills$time_index
bills_time_index <- as.integer(bills_time_index - 100)
keyATM_docs <- keyATM_read(bills_dfm)
```


```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.align='center'}
fitted <- keyATM(keyATM_docs    = keyATM_docs,  # text input
                 regular_k      = 7,            # number of regular topics
                 model          = "ldahmm",     # select the model
                 model_settings = list(time_index = bills_time_index, 
                                       num_states = 5),
                 options        = list(seed = 100))
top_words(out)
```
